other_tests.findings: Molecular abnormalities associated with FH deficiencies were characterized, including nucleotide substitutions, insertions, or deletions leading to amino acid substitutions or stop codons.
TMA lesions were detected in various patients.
Patients exhibited severe complement consumption through the alternative pathway with undetectable FH antigen levels and low levels of C3 and FB.
other_tests.changes_over_time: In patient 12, a second blood sample showed evidence of alternative pathway complement activation and half normal levels of plasma FH.

other_tests.findings: Performed in patients with acute phases showing TMA lesions.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Patients regained independent renal function after the procedure.
